//: Appears in the refugee center as shopkeeper with missions.  Faction critical.

dynamic_line.yes: What are you buying, what are you selling?
dynamic_line.no: What are you buying, what are you selling?

responses.text: What is it like being a gun merchant around here?
Would you be willing to let me buy anything?
Do you have a task for me?

dynamic_line.yes: You would be surprised at the amount of business we get, even all the way down here in a subway. I guess it pays to be a safe-haven in an unsafe world. A lot of people are pretty confused by our guns though, it's like they've never seen them before.
dynamic_line.no: You would be surprised at the amount of business we get, even all the way down here in a subway. I guess it pays to be a safe-haven in an unsafe world. A lot of people are pretty confused by our guns though, it's like they've never seen them before.

name: Retrieve two firearm repair kits for the Gun Merchant.
description: Retrieve two firearm repair kits for the Gun Merchant.

dialogue.describe: I've been running low on gun repair kits. It seems like conflict with other stations has flared up again recently, and we're quickly running through supplies. We'll reach a maintenance bottleneck soon, and we can't afford to have that happen.
dialogue.offer: I would appreciate it greatly if you could get me two firearm repair kits, if that's not too much to ask.
dialogue.accepted: I thank you for accepting this, now make it quick, we don't have time to spare.
dialogue.rejected: That's unfortunate, but I guess I'll have to find some way to make things work out.
dialogue.advice: Gun stores on the surface probably have firearm repair kits, perhaps you could even make one yourself if you know enough.
dialogue.inquire: Have you found what I requested yet?
dialogue.success: Great work, things in South Gate just got a little safer thanks to you.
dialogue.success_lie: That's odd, I don't really know what to say.
dialogue.failure: Well, you did what you could. It's just that things will get more difficult fron now on.
